description.@en: A willing person swears to carry out a sacred vow or forswears from a specific action.

data.distance: Any one person you can touch

criticalFailure.@en: Although you word the pledge right, it doesnâ€™t seem to take Effect. You are held to a vow yourself, given at the behest of the Abyssal Princes. You will suffer a -20% to Brawn if you break this vow and must see it through to its completion.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but they instead suffer -20% to Brawn.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, the person you touch vows to carry out or swear against an action you set. Breaking this vow temporarily drops their Brawn by -10%, until the oath-breaker appeals to you to lift the Magick or completes the task they were charged to do. Once the vow is upheld and comes to fruition, the Magick fades.

reagents.@en: A willing participant, whose name you announce
